Metadata.title: VOTO - Voting made easy
Metadata.description: Evaluate the election manifestos and find out which party suits you best.

ShareDrawer.systemModalDescription: Evaluate the election manifestos and find out which party suits you best.
ShareDrawer.title: Your personal VOTO code
ShareDrawer.description: Your ratings can be accessed for using the code above. You can save the link to the ratings by using the "Share" button below and view your result again.

ThesisCard.starDisabledExplanation: You cannot weight any more theses as the maximum has been reached. However, you can change your weights later on the result page.

BreakDrawer.title: Stopover
BreakDrawer.descriptionSkip: You have completed {completedTheses, plural, =1 {# statement} other {# statements}} and can now jump directly to the result, although the result may be less accurate.
BreakDrawer.descriptionContinue: To improve the calculation, you can answer {remainingTheses, plural, =1 {# more thesis} other {# more theses}}. Your result will be more accurate and you'll learn more about different topics.

ThesesResultCarousel.useVOTOSort: Use your VOTO for sorting instead
